name: Press The Button Simulator
description:
The "game" is simple: Click the hand to press the button. Each time you do, you get 1 point.

  • "Game" is merely a test for building Unity projects, something I did not know how to do before.
  • Incredibly simple and lackluster.
  • Might update every once in a while.
  • Might make a browser alternative so you don't have to look at this thing on your computer (When I figure out how.)
    • Unity makes web export the most excruciating task possible.
